posts.name: Cosmic bouquet
posts.description: Too beautiful to be true, isn't it?) A cosmic bouquet will win a girl's heart at first sight. The tenderness of peonies, the airiness of nigella and the texture of tulips will give you real aesthetic pleasure.

posts.name: Violet dreams
posts.description: A bouquet that will win the heart of any girl, in a medium size. Delicate and bright, fragrant and unusual. Space tulips tend to run out quickly, so we recommend checking with the store administrator for the availability of these flowers)

posts.name: Hydrangea with garden roses

posts.name: Basket with seasonal flowers
posts.description: A full basket of seasonal flowers is the dream of almost every girl. You can take it with you on a picnic or arrange a photo shoot for Instagram.
